view.name: Default
view.content:
{{#each Control}}
{{#if (equals controlType "MICROSOFT.TrackerCategory")}}
{{{description}}}
{{/if}}
{{/each}}
view.css: <style>.Tracker-category-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px } .Tracker-category-header { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 18px; line-height: 20px; } .Categories { margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 2px; line-height: 1.5; } .TrackerCategory-toggle { outline: transparent; position: relative; font-size: 20px; box-sizing: border-box; min-width: 48px; height: 24px; border-radius: 10px; transition: all .1s ease 0s; background-color: #605e5c; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 0 3px; overflow: visible; margin: 0 3px } .TrackerCategory-slider { display: block; width: 15px; height: 15px; border-radius: 50%; transition: all .1s ease 0s; background-color: beige; border-color: transparent; border-width: 6px; border-style: solid; box-sizing: border-box } .TrackerCategory-input { display: none; } .TrackerCategory-label { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } input:checked + .TrackerCategory-label > div:nth-of-type(2) { background: #0078d4; justify-content: flex-end } input:checked + .TrackerCategory-label > div > span { background-color: #fff } input:disabled + .TrackerCategory-label > div > span { opacity: 0.5; }</style>
